import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About Us

Our Story

Our Founder - Mohammad Khairulla Rafiulla Ansari (aka KR)

Mohammad Khairulla Rafiulla Ansari , the visionary founder of KR Enterprises, established the company with a mission to bridge the talent gap across borders. With over two decades of experience in international recruitment and talent management, John has been a driving force in connecting businesses with top-tier professionals worldwide. His deep understanding of the global job market, coupled with a passion for helping individuals find their dream careers, has positioned KR Enterprises as a leader in the recruitment industry.

Our CEO - Mohammad Nasim Khairulla Ansari (aka KR)

As the CEO of KR Enterprises, Mohammad Nasim Ansari brings a wealth of experience and a visionary approach to the international recruitment industry. With a passion for connecting talent with the right opportunities, Nasim has been instrumental in driving the company's growth and success.

Our CFO - Mohammad Ayub Khairulla Ansari (aka KR)

Mohammad Ayub Khairulla Ansari is the Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of KR Enterprises. With a distinguished career in finance and international recruitment, Ayub brings a wealth of expertise and a strategic vision to our company. His leadership and dedication have been instrumental in driving KR Enterprises' growth and success.

); }; export default AboutUs;
